name: Back to the Future 2
description:
Back to the Future 2 is an arcade game developed by Mirrorsoft. It came out on 01-01-1990. It was published by ImageWorks. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Back to the Future 2 on PC.
Bob Gale and Neil Canton produced the game. Robert Zemeckis directed the game. Alan Silvestri scored the game.
